Reviews.Title: “Pass this motel up”

Reviews.Content: management polite motel dump noisy carpet smells carpet outside deck worn torn wasnt continental breakfast consisted cold ceral coffee cold booked website check didnt reservation hour 3 phone calls reservation straightened wont stay

Reviews.Title: “Nice for the price!”
Reviews.Author: JennyC1
Reviews.Content: family stayed nights visiting branson particularly silver dollar city location perfect short traffic drive sdc mcdonalds pizza hut door motel dated flashy seriously 3900 night earth complain clean bathroom clean fine tv reception lots channel choices 5 star resort course clean comfortable yes pillows bit flat own tried breakfast mcdonalds fine dont breakfast people expect cost 50 tourist trap dont meet expenses price clean price stay traffic branson 76 location inn makes lot easier mobs

Reviews.Title: “Good bargain”
Reviews.Author: weebes
Reviews.Content: stayed lakeview inn july 8 11th fifth stayed bargain price bare bones beds 19 inch tv table dresser toiletries except bar soap clean pool clean sits miles silver dollar city sits dollar store grocery store miles super walmart 20 minutes drive branson beautiful view sits pizza hut mcdonalds walk food access coin operated washer dryer costs 2 dollars load washer dryer laundry street save money people run inn helpful friendly provide breakfast morning biscuits gravy toaster waffles toast cereal juice coffee cost saver family overall pleased paid 50 dollars night expedia usually deal july night free paid nights 50 dollar gas card paid nights cant beat value

Reviews.Title: “DISGUSTING”
Reviews.Author: johns0687
Reviews.Content: wasnt expecting 53night hotel grossest stayed day sister stayed 100 degrees air conditioner hadnt prior arrival checked actually cold door 3 locks tells desk didnt id sister checked giving teenagers children night creepy terrible smell comforter disgusting water pressure shower pitiful
